Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Takla Haymanout:

Text.Language: <ere pinis] na~gioc: n~te Eyiopia nem Aiguptoc: ,ere piyaumatourgoc: Yekla Humanoy pip~recbuteroc.
Hail to the great Saint, who belongs to Ethiopia and Egypt, Hail to the wonderworker, Takla Haymanout the priest.
السلام للقديس العظيم: الذي لأثيوبيا ومصر: السلام للعجائبي: تكلا هيمانوت القس.
